trans-unit.source: Specifies that a data field value in ASP.NET Dynamic Data must match the specified regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ASP.NET Dynamic Data 中的資料欄位值必須符合指定的規則運算式 (Regular Expression)。

trans-unit.source: You apply the RegularExpressionAttribute attribute to a property when you need to validate values for the property against a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 您需要驗證的比對規則運算式的屬性值 RegularExpressionAttribute 屬性套用至屬性。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression enables you to specify very precisely the format of valid values.
trans-unit.target: 規則運算式可讓您指定非常精確的格式有效的值。

trans-unit.source: The Pattern property contains the regular expression.If the value of the property is null or an empty string (""), the value automatically passes validation for the RegularExpressionAttribute attribute.
trans-unit.target: [模式] 屬性包含規則運算式。如果屬性的值是 null 或空字串 ("")，此值會自動通過 RegularExpressionAttribute 屬性的驗證。

trans-unit.source: To validate that the value is not `null` or an empty string, use the **RequiredAttribute** attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要驗證的值不是`null`或空字串，使用**出現 RequiredAttribute**屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.RegularExpressionAttribute> attribute to validate the FirstName and LastName data fields.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.RegularExpressionAttribute>驗證 FirstName 和 LastName 資料欄位的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression allows up to 40 uppercase and lowercase characters.
trans-unit.target: 規則運算式可讓多達 40 個大寫和小寫字元。

trans-unit.source: The example performs the following tasks:
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會執行下列工作：

trans-unit.source: Implements a metadata partial class and the associated metadata class.
trans-unit.target: 實作中繼資料的部分類別和相關聯的中繼資料類別。

trans-unit.source: In the associated metadata class, applies the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.RegularExpressionAttribute> attribute to the FirstName and LastName data fields, specifying the pattern and custom error messages.
trans-unit.target: 在相關聯的中繼資料類別中，適用於<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.RegularExpressionAttribute>屬性設定為 FirstName 和 LastName 資料欄位，指定的模式和自訂錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression that is used to validate the data field value.
trans-unit.target: 用來驗證資料欄位值的規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.RegularExpressionAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.RegularExpressionAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to apply the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.RegularExpressionAttribute> to a data field.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何套用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.RegularExpressionAttribute>屬於某個資料欄位。

trans-unit.source: If validation fails, the code in the example displays the validation error message that is provided by Dynamic Data.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證失敗，此範例中的程式碼會顯示動態資料所提供的驗證錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pattern" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pattern" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field that caused the validation failure.
trans-unit.target: 造成錯誤失敗之欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Formats the error message to display if the regular expression validation fails.
trans-unit.target: 格式化要在規則運算式驗證失敗時顯示的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The formatted error message.
trans-unit.target: 格式化的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.RegularExpressionAttribute.FormatErrorMessage%2A> creates the error message by using the name of the data field that caused the validation failure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.RegularExpressionAttribute.FormatErrorMessage%2A>使用造成驗證失敗的資料欄位的名稱建立錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method in custom validation attributes to customize how errors are created or to provide a more complex message that contains parameters that you evaluate at run time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫這個方法在自訂建立錯誤的方式，或提供更複雜的訊息，其中包含您在執行階段所評估之參數的自訂驗證屬性。

trans-unit.source: The data field value to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的資料欄位值。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the value entered by the user matches the regular expression pattern.
trans-unit.target: 檢查使用者輸入的值是否符合規則運算式模式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if validation is successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證成功，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The data field value did not match the regular expression pattern.
trans-unit.target: 資料欄位值不符合規則運算式模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or set the amount of time in milliseconds to execute a single matching operation before the operation times out.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定執行單一比對作業，直到作業逾時之前的時間 (以毫秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time in milliseconds to execute a single matching operation.
trans-unit.target: 執行單一比對作業的時間 (以毫秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the regular expression pattern.
trans-unit.target: 取得規則運算式模式。

trans-unit.source: The pattern to match.
trans-unit.target: 須符合的模式。
